name: Covid Crush
description:
Covid Crush is a 2D Platformer Video Game developed by a team of 5 Gaming Technology students of VIT, Bhopal. The game serves its purpose as both an interesting platformer and an educational video game.

Controls

WASD - Move the Doctor.

Spacebar - Jump. 

Holding or pressing the spacebar again after Jump - allows the player to use the jetpack.

J - Attack
